page.title: 01Summary of 05625452
page.content: This block lying in the centre of Jersey contains the Centre Stone. For the most part the land, level and relatively high, is interspersed by valleys containing some of the main reservoirs one of them being Handois. Naturally the main industry is agricultural, with strong horticultural overtones. The tourist industry does not seem to be well represented in this area, as its central position is fairly remote from the beaches. Only one large store located in the N.E of the block is to be found, that of D.I.Y. and Garden Centre. In the rural areas most of the farm buildings are of considerable age and well maintained, which could be evidence of the prosperity of the farming industry.
